Text.Page:
We're low on food. Like, really low. {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} wants someone to go to {@Rgn:7001#Celestial Hills} right away and get us some rations.

Tell her you're available, as clearly, you are. Look at me, I'm shaking!
<PCNAME>, did Taratia tell you we need someone to go to the {@Rgn:7001#Celestial Hills} for a good, old-fashioned hunt? Will you go?

Whoohoo! {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} will be so glad you're back. We're practically starving to death.

You wouldn't think that'd be possible in the big city, would you?

Hunt {@LinkCreature:7#1$$naga mercenaries} in the {@Rgn:7001#Celestial Hills} and bring back some fresh meat.

Go! Quickly! I've never been so hungry in all my life. You wouldn't believe how greedy people are around here. Sharing is not caring in Velika. Not lately.

Thanks, . This is fresh, right? It smells okay.

Let {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} know you're back. Cause she probably can't see you. I'm being sarcastic.

Hunt {@LinkCreature:7#3$$indolent kumases} in the {@Rgn:7001#Celestial Hills} and bring back some delicious kumas blubber.

It's actually really good. Hey! Beggars can't be choosers.

I can't wait to make something tasty out of this. Thanks, !

{@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} has your payment.

Hunt {@LinkCreature:7#4$$torpid kumases} in the {@Rgn:7001#Celestial Hills} and bring back kumas blubber.

If we weren't so hungry, I could make lipstick out of that blubber. You have to dye it, of course, if you want your lips to really pop. Eew, that was a weird visual.

Thanks, . This is fresh and wonderful. Want to come back for dinner?

{@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} will be happy to put an extra place setting at the table for you.
Hunt {@LinkCreature:7#23$$juggernaut mercenaries} in {@Rgn:7001#Celestial Hills} and bring back some meat. That stuff is tough, but it makes decent jerky.
Thank the gods for you, <PCNAME>. We'll live to see another day.
